question.title: Android APK recording in JMeter via Android Studio Emulator
question.body:
I have installed an Android emulator, where I have my application's APK installed (I can't disclose the APK name as it belongs to the IT company where I work). I have successfully established a connection between JMeter, running locally, and the Android emulator. I followed all the necessary steps and I am able to record the traffic from the mobile browser (e.g., Chrome). However, when I try to record the mobile application, I encounter the following error screen. Mobile application error screen

Do I need to follow additional steps in order to record the traffic of mobile apk. Can someone please guide me. Thank you.

I have tried adding Jmeter rootCA certificate in wifi additional settings window. Also added the certificate in security/privacy tab in android settings
